data_sources.description: Contains training data for segmentation, including StudyInstanceUID and fold information.
Various Keras segmentation model files imported for model utilization.

data_variables.description: DataFrame containing training data read from 'train_v2.csv'.
Dictionary mapping StudyInstanceUIDs to their corresponding fold numbers.
The loaded segmentation model used to generate masks.
List of TFRecord file paths for training data.

data_flow.flow: Used to create uid_fold_dict, which is used during serialization of TFRecords.
Used to find the corresponding fold for each StudyInstanceUID when serializing TFRecords.
Used to predict the masks for the images batch.
Used to load training datasets and generate masks that are serialized into TFRecords.

models.target_variable: Masks generated by the segmentation model.
